concept.title: Stream Selector
concept.shortdesc: The Stream Selector passes data to streams based on conditions.

conbody.p: Stream SelectoroverviewprocessorsStream SelectorWhen you configure a condition, the Stream Selector creates an output for the stage that you connect to a downstream stage. The Stream Selector passes a record to all streams where the record matches the condition.
A record with a missing ID from California is sent to both streams.
